## IfBlock interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IfBlock 
```

## Remarks

One of the following functions to instantiate an `IfBlock`<!-- -->. - [ifThen()](./mapping-template-compose.ifthen.md) - [ifThenElse()](./mapping-template-compose.ifthenelse.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [blockType](./mapping-template-compose.ifblock.blocktype.md) | <code>readonly</code> | 'if-block' | **_(BETA)_** Always "if-block". |
|  [condition](./mapping-template-compose.ifblock.condition.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | **_(BETA)_** Condition of the <code>if</code>. Do not include the directive; i.e., <code>#if</code>. |
|  [elseBlock?](./mapping-template-compose.ifblock.elseblock.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [MappingTemplateItem](./mapping-template-compose.mappingtemplateitem.md)<!-- -->\[\] | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Block to be evaluated when the condition does not stand. |
|  [thenBlock](./mapping-template-compose.ifblock.thenblock.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [MappingTemplateItem](./mapping-template-compose.mappingtemplateitem.md)<!-- -->\[\] | **_(BETA)_** Block to be evaluated when the condition stands. |
